ygData.subject: RE: Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever (long, possibly rant ish)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, even attempting that now would get you stunned so many times you would never take another step.  I find that the current functionality appears to be:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, even attempting that now would get you stunned so many times you
would never take another step. I find that the current functionality
appears to be: Mob nods, 50% of the time mob sleeps. Not bad on a lone
mob, for crowd control, useless. Ok, worse than useless as you get so
aggro'd to the mob they ignore the tanks and run over to beat on you. Yeah
my bard is not a tank, he just plays one on EQ.

Kitasi punching bag of BlackBurrow

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Saturday, December 04, 1999 5:48 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever
(long, possibly rant ish)


From: jhenders@...

On Fri, Dec 03/99, Donny Dane <ddane@...> wrote:

> Wouldn't know - been playing since day two of release, and am still only
> 20th level. I guess I'm sorry I didn't try to powerlevel up, so I could
> have actually used some of the songs before they nerfed them to
uselessness.
> Of course, they seem to have fixed others, so maybe I still have something
> to look forward to.

They nerfed it well before release I'm afraid. To get an idea of how
well it worked in beta, check out this screenshot I saved from my BB
days in P4.

http://www.bogon.com/~jhenders/lullaby1.jpg
